text.en: Namo Guru: homage to the Guru!
Mahā Guru, bless me
That in all my lives to come,
In the palace in your pure land,
Inseparable from you, master, I will always be.
And with zeal and devotion,
I will serve you and please you,
And receive the transmission of your nectar-like blessing:
Your profound realization, the very essence of your wisdom mind.
Let the blessing of your enlightened body, speech and mind,
text.en-trans: ku sung tuk kyi jinlab kyi

text.en: Ripen my own body, speech and mind,
text.en-trans: lü ngak yi sum minpa dang

text.en: So that I gain mastery over the profound
Generation and completion stages.
May I eliminate completely the demons of wrong views,
text.en-trans: loktok dü kyi tsok nam dang

text.en: Along with illness, harmful influence and obstacles,
And may good companions and resources multiply,
So that my wishes are all fulfilled, just as I desire.
In charnel grounds, hermitages, retreats amid the snows,
And other secluded places with all perfect qualities,
Let the quintessence of deep samādhi meditation
Be my constant practice.
And as the result of this practice,
May I accomplish the four activities,
Turn even gods andrākṣasasinto my servants,
text.en-trans: lhasin dren du khol né kyang

text.en: And so be able to protect the teachings of Buddha.
May all the sublime teachings taught by Buddha
Appear, with no effort, within my mind;
And, through mastering supreme knowledge such as this,
text.en-trans: khyenpa chok la nga nyé né

text.en: May I attain supreme realization.
Through bodhicitta’s causes and conditions,
May I reach and magnetize every single living being,
And through the power of my actions, unbounded like a wish-granting gem,
May any connection we have be of deepest benefit and meaning.
May I cause the teachings of Buddha to spread,
So that lineage holders and teachers of Dharma increase,
text.en-trans: gyü dzin chö tön gyepa dang

text.en: All beings are brought to bliss,
text.en-trans: dro kün dé la khö né kyang

text.en: And all realms are purified into buddha fields.
From my body, speech and mind,
text.en-trans: dak gi lü ngak yi sum gyi

text.en: Let infinite emanations appear,
To benefit each of those to be trained,
text.en-trans: gang la gang dul trulpé ku

text.en: Every one according to their needs.
May I realize the entirety of saṃsāra and nirvāṇa
Is your manifestation, Guru, inseparable from you,
And by understanding the three kāyas to be forever indivisible,
May I swiftly attain the omniscience of buddhahood.
May sentient beings offer their prayers,
May the masters grant their blessings,
Mayyidamdeities grant attainments,
May ḍākinīs grant predictions,
May Dharma protectors dispel obstacles,
May the Buddha’s teaching spread and grow,
text.en-trans: sangyé tenpa dar zhing gyepar shok

text.en: May all beings enjoy happiness and well-being,
text.en-trans: semchen tamché dé zhing kyipar shok

text.en: May they live out the Dharma day and night,
text.en-trans: nyin dang tsen du chö la chöpar shok

text.en: May our own and others’ aims be spontaneously accomplished.
text.en-trans: rangzhen dön nyi lhün gyi drubpar shok

text.en: Through this merit, pure by its very nature,
Let saṃsāra’s depths, the lower realms, be emptied,
So no longer we remain in this ocean of existence,
text.en-trans: si tsor lar yang mi né shing

text.en: But actualize the three kāyas, together—all as one.
text.en-trans: chamchik ku sum ngön gyur shok

text.en: Great secret treasure of all the buddhas,
text.en-trans: gyalwa kün gyi sang chen dzö

text.en: Supreme, unsurpassed teaching of Dzogpachenpo,
Like a sun rising in the sky,
Shine and spread through the entire world!
May this merit and my other roots of virtue grow,
text.en-trans: dak gi gewé tsawa di dang gewé tsawa zhendak kyang kyé né

text.en: So that I embody all the precious qualities that fulfil the wishes of the perfect master,
text.en-trans: palden lamé tukgong yongsu dzokpé yönten dang denpar gyur chik

text.en: I possess the power to spread and expand the Buddha’s precious teachings,
text.en-trans: sangyé kyi tenpa rinpoché dar zhing gyepar jepé kyebu tobden du gyur chik

text.en: I realize ultimate wisdom, love and capacity, and so become perfectly enlightened,
text.en-trans: khyenpa dang tsewa nüpa sum tarchin né dzokpé sangyé su gyur chik

text.en: And all sentient beings in the six realms are freed from saṃsāra’s great ocean of suffering, and quickly attain complete and perfect buddhahood.
text.en-trans: drowa rik druk na nepé semchen tamché khorwa dukngal gyi gyatso lé dral té nyurdu ngönpar dzokpar sangyé par gyur chik
